    Cookbook¶

    Here you’ll find some recipes for doing common tasks using Fatiando, like generating synthetic data, running inversions, and plotting things.

    Tip

    You can download .py files of the recipes by clicking on the “Download source code” link below the recipe title.

    Spectroscopy¶

    • Spectroscopy: Calculating the center and depth of an absortium band
    • Spectroscopy: Fiting and Autofiting
    • Spectroscopy: Loading and Visualizing a Spectrum
    • Spectroscopy: trim, rebin and clean a spectrum
    • Spectroscopy: Calculating the spectral gradient
    • Spectroscopy: Taxonomic classification

    Spectrophotometry¶

    • Spectrophotometry: Calculating the probability of an absorptium band
    • Spectroscopy: load and view a photometric catalog of asteroids
    • Spectroscopy: Calculating the slope from photometric data
    • Spectroscopy: Calculating the center and depth of an absortium band
